SEARCH
Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game

Class MultiplayerGame

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game.Game
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game.MultiplayerGame
public class MultiplayerGame extends Game
The MultiplayerGame class handles the main logic of the multiplayer part of the game. It extends Game so the gameplay is similar with some changes.

      Create a new game with the specified rows and columns. Creates a corresponding grid model.
      Parameters:
      cols - number of columns
      rows - number of rows
      communicator - passes the instance of the communicator
